perturbation.original_text: Each Service Option Attachment will renew automatically for an additional term equal in duration to the previous term of the applicable Service Option Attachment unless either party notifies the other party in writing at least ninety (90) days prior to the end of the then-current term for the applicable Service Option Attachment that it has elected to terminate such Service Option Attachment.
perturbation.changed_text: Each Service Option Attachment will renew automatically for an additional term equal in duration to the previous term of the applicable Service Option Attachment unless either party notifies the other party in writing at least ninety (90) days prior to the end of the then-current term for the applicable Service Option Attachment that it has elected to terminate such Service Option Attachment. However, renewal is not guaranteed and is subject to IBM's discretion based on its current business priorities.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states automatic renewal with a 90-day notice exception. The modified text adds a clause that the renewal is also 'subject to IBM's discretion,' creating a contradiction and uncertainty about the renewal process. The automatic nature is undermined by IBM's discretionary power.

perturbation.original_text: Charges for applicable Services will be specified in Service Option Attachments and Order Forms. Charges can be specified as one-time, installment, recurring, or usage. IBM will invoice such Charges when they begin or are due as set forth in Service Option Attachments.
perturbation.changed_text: Charges for applicable Services will be specified in Service Option Attachments and Order Forms. Charges can be specified as one-time, installment, recurring, or usage. IBM will invoice such Charges when they begin or are due as set forth in Service Option Attachments. However, IBM reserves the right to modify these charges at any point in time, with only verbal notification to the customer.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly states charges will be specified in writing in the attachments. The added clause allows IBM to change the charges 'at any point in time with only verbal notification,' creating a contradiction and uncertainty about the reliability of the written charges.

perturbation.original_text: IBM represents and warrants that: a. it will perform the Services using reasonable care and skill and in accordance with the applicable Service Option Attachments (which means the degree of knowledge, skill and judgment customarily exercised by members of the applicable profession with respect to work of a similar nature); and that it will provide Customer with competent, fully trained, fully qualified and responsible personnel to perform the Services; and
perturbation.changed_text: IBM represents and warrants that: a. it will perform the Services using reasonable care and skill and in accordance with the applicable Service Option Attachments (which means the degree of knowledge, skill and judgment customarily exercised by members of the applicable profession with respect to work of a similar nature); and that it will provide Customer with competent, fully trained, fully qualified and responsible personnel to perform the Services; and Notwithstanding the warranty above, IBM's personnel assignments are subject to change at IBM's sole discretion, and IBM does not guarantee consistent staffing throughout the term of the agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original text warrants the provision of 'competent, fully trained, fully qualified and responsible personnel'. The added clause states 'IBM does not guarantee consistent staffing throughout the term of the agreement'. This introduces a contradiction, as consistent staffing is expected for competent service and can lead to uncertainty.
